flashmodes: Auto, Auto with red-eye reduction, Forced On with red-eye reduction, Slow Sync with red-eye reduction
autofocus: Yes, Contrast Detect, Multi-Area, Center, Single, Face Detection
whitebalancing: White Balance Presets (Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Shade, Incandescent, White Set), Custom White Balance
otherfocusfeatures: Focal Length Multiplier (5.5x), Normal Focus Range (15 cm), No. Of Focus Points (9), Fixed Articulated LCD, 7 elements in 5 groups (5 Aspherical Lenses, 8 Aspherical Surfaces)
operatingsystem: Included Software (PHOTOfunSTUDIO 6.0 Edition, QuickTime, Adobe Reader )
shootingmodes: Creative Exposure Modes (Portrait, Self- Portrait, Scenery, Panorama Assist, Sports, Night Portrait, Night Scenery, Food, Party, Baby, Sunset, High sensitivity, Fireworks, Beach, Snow )
